Un nouveau lien à été envoyé à votre adr: A new verification link has been sent to your email.
Avant de continuer, veuillez consulter v: Before continuing, please consult your emails for a verification link.
Si vous n'avez pas reçu de lien: If you did not receive a link
cliquez ici pour renvoyer un autre: click here to send a new one
Veuillez confirmer votre mot de passe av: Please confirm your password before continuing.
Description du site et des fonctionalité: Description of the Website and features
Lorsque nous accédons au site, nous somm: When we access the site, we are asked to log in in order to access the service. At the top right of the page, we find the 'Register' button which allows you to create an account. Once the account is created, a new user is created in the database and we are redirected to the login page. In addition, a verification link is automatically sent to the email entered to confirm the account creation
Une fois le compte créer nous pouvons no: Once the account is created, we can log in. It is possible to ask the site to keep our session open if the page is suddenly closed. It is important to note that it will be impossible to access the pages until email verification has been done. If this is the case, the user will be redirected to a page that allows a verification link to be returned if needed. Once the audit is complete, services will be accessible
Le site entier est traduit en anglais, f: The entire site is translated into English, French and Spanish as well as error messages. It is possible at any time to use the drop-down menu in the navigation bar to translate the page you are on
La page des réparations affiche toutes l: The repairs page displays all the repairs that exist. It allows you to click on each of them and see their details. This page also contains a button at the top right that allows you to add a new repair
Lorsque l'on clique sur une réparation s: When we click on a specific repair, we are directed to a page that displays the full details of it. In addition, there is a button that allows you to visit the page of the vehicle on which the repair was done as well as two buttons that allow you to modify and delete this repair
Cette page permet d'ajouter une nouvelle: Use this page to add a new repair for a vehicle. All fields are required
Cette page permet de modifier les détail: Use this page to edit the details of a repair. Only modified fields will be affected
Cette fonctionalité permet de supprimer: This feature allows you to delete a repair
La page des véhicules affiche tous les v: The vehicles page displays all existing vehicles with their image. It allows you to click on each of them and see their details. This page also contains a button at the top right that allows you to add a new vehicle
Lorsque l'on clique sur un véhicule spéc: Lorsque l'on clique sur un véhicule spécifique, nous somme dirigés vers une page qui affiche les détails complets de celui-ci. De plus, on y trouve un historique complet de toutes les réparations faites sur ce véhicule, un boutton qui permet de visiter la page de l'utilisateur propriétaire ainsi que deux bouttons qui permettent la modification et la suppression de ce véhicule
Cette page permet d'ajouter un nouveau v: This page allows you to add a new vehicle for a user. All fields are required except the one in the image. If no photo is provided, a generic image will be set by default
Cette page permet de modifier les détail: Use this page to edit the details of a vehicle. Only modified fields will be affected
Cette fonctionalitée permet de supprimer: This feature allows you to delete a vehicle
La page des utilisateurs affiche tous le: The users page displays all the users that exist. It allows you to click on each of them and see their details. This page, unlike the others, does not contain a button that allows the addition of a new user since these are added through the registration to the site
Lorsque l'on clique sur un utilisateur s: When we click on a specific user, we are directed to a page that displays the full details of that user. There is also a list of vehicles owned by that user
Premièrement, créez-vous un compte avec: First, create an account with the button sign up in the navigation bar. Once this step is done, you can check your emails for a verification link. Keep in mind that at any time it is possible to translate the page using the drop-down menu in the navigation bar. Once logged in, we can go to the 'Vehicles' section in order to add a vehicle with the button at the top right. It is possible to give it an image or leave it blank. If no image is given, a default image will be assigned. It is then possible to click on the vehicle to see the details, access the owner's profile, see the list of repairs, modify or delete it. Then, in 'Repair', add a new repair using the button at the top right. Again, it is possible to view the details, access the vehicle on which the repair was made, modify or delete the repair. Finally, the same thing is possible in the 'Users' section
